Uses of Class
uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.Logo

  • Packages that use Logo 
    Package Description
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player
    This is the main package for vlcj client applications, providing the classes necessary to create and control native media players and associated resources.

    • Uses of Logo in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player

      Logo Logo.disable()
      Disable the logo.
      Logo Logo.enable()
      Enable the logo.

      Apply the initial enabled/disabled state.

      Apply the logo file.

      Apply the logo image.

      Apply the logo position in video co-ordinates.

      Create a logo.
